真係時也命也 ！

好多人…
已經打緊私人工，
唔想減薪做公僕！

真係短視…
做唔到放下身段，
只放眼個起薪點！
(白白益晒90後…)

反而你睇…
CA 頂薪 24,070
ACO 頂薪 31,750
而出面起薪20,000，
但廿年後可到40,000？
(未俾人炒已經好彩)

到你真正頂薪…
CA 已超 40,000
ACO 已超 50,000
但只係十二年嘅事！

到咗真正廿年之後，
月薪真係不敢想像！
個fd做ACO 係副業 正職搞網店炒股

Life in Hong Kong, the “San Gong!” is the only winner (Public housing, civil servants, public aid)

1: public housing...
Rent just a little bit more than two thousand HKD and ten years free of review!
legislative council members can live ,pt.25 civil servant ($51095) can live in public housing too!

2:Civil servants...
Primary 6 education and salary are over HKD10,000. Their benefits are considered good, you can earn public housing benefit too!

3: public aid...
Whenever the economy is good, double pay will be the bonus! Whenever the economy declines, double pay will be provided for handling your trouble!

Fortunately, our college students are smart and they recognise their life goal... and aim for “San Gong!”. “San Gong” can support the important Seven things in life!

eat, drink, play, have fun, sleep, Buying a house, settle mortgage.
